Posts.Content: Hi Dr Lim, 4.5 years in, Stage 4, Her2+ with mets to lungs, on my 2nd line of treatment, Herceptin constantly coupled with TDM1 held for two years and currently now on Xeloda for two years. I am Doing really well, Diet, exercise, mind - body - spirit & positivity with amazing support though the oncologist gave a prognisis of five years to live three years ago. My ? Is, in your opinion and given that I tolerate treatment very well and generally lead a great quality of life , what combination would come next in your view if Xeloda stopped working?. I am UK based and under the world class Christie in Manchester Kind Regards Jennifer
Posts.Title: Ask the Expert: Breast cancer oncologist Dr. Bora Lim returns
